article_html:
Since 2013 the Scottish film-maker Ryan McHenry has built a huge viral audience

A

Vines: Ryan McHenry and Ryan Gosling

Since 2013 the Scottish film-maker Ryan McHenry has built a huge viral audience for his Vine series 'Ryan Gosling Won't Eat His Cereal', in which the star appears to refuse to eat his cereal. Gosling had no involvement with the series, but when it was announced this week that McHenry had died from osteosarcoma, the actor paid tribute with a Vine of his own Ryan McHenry memorial fund has been opened to raise money for cancer researchVines: Ryan McHenry and Ryan Gosling
authors: Source Ryan Mchenry Ryan Gosling Vine

title: Ryan Gosling eats cereal in tribute to Vine creator Ryan McHenry – video
